fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / more bullet thoughts
fields.Description: quick comments with kim or not about the other bullet holes in this wall.

fields.Title: START
input
You: "Examine closer."
fields.Dialogue Text: Examine closer.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "More old bullet holes, half a centu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: More old bullet holes, half a century at least, from the Revolution.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Bullet holes generally look the sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Bullet holes generally look the same, so... probably." He leans in to inspect the wall. "But you are right, more old bullet holes from the Revolution."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. But what can you tell me abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. But what can you tell me about the Revolution?"

fields.Title: You: ""So, no crime has happened here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, no crime has happened here?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Might be the after-effects of your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Might be the after-effects of your... past escapades. What are you looking at?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, we're not constructors and ren..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, we're not constructors and renovators. And these bullet holes do not warrant an investigation."

fields.Title: CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"] == true
CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"] == true
!(CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"] == true)
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_asked_wardamage"] == true  or  Variable["plaza.rene_mentioned_revolution_and_couron"] == true  or  Variable["tc.revolution"] == true
Variable["plaza.rene_asked_wardamage"] == true  or  Variable["plaza.rene_mentioned_revolution_and_couron"] == true  or  Variable["tc.revolution"] == true

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["plaza.rene_asked_wardamage"] == true  or  Variable["plaza.rene_mentioned_revolution_and_couron"] == true  or  Variable["tc.revolution"] == true

fields.Title: !(Variable["plaza.rene_asked_wardamage"] == true  or  Variable["plaza.rene_mentioned_revolution_and_couron"] == true  or  Variable["tc.revolution"] == true)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["plaza.rene_asked_wardamage"] == true  or  Variable["plaza.rene_mentioned_revolution_and_couron"] == true  or  Variable["tc.revolution"] == true) == false

fields.Title: You: ""Is there something we should do ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is there something we should do about these?"

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Your chest feels tight, looking at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your chest feels tight, looking at them. It's closing in... caving in, ever tighter. Your breathing grows even heavier.

fields.Title: You: ""Man, I started feeling really bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Man, I started feeling really bad for a second."

fields.Title: Shivers: "The streets ran red with blood. Dus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The streets ran red with blood. Dust swirled above the ruins. The pressure change from artillery fire ripped people apart in the top floors of the building above you...

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "More old bullet holes, at least hal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: More old bullet holes, at least half a century. A different era altogether.

fields.Title: You: ""These bullet holes look like the b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "These bullet holes look like the bullet holes we saw before."

fields.Title: You: "(Breathe out sharply.) "Huh, yeah-y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Breathe out sharply.) "Huh, yeah-yeah, I'm fine."

fields.Title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: You: ""Never mind, then. Let's go." [Disc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Never mind, then. Let's go." [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were looking pale there for a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were looking pale there for a second. What are you looking at?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [morekimquestions]
You: ""Figured as much." [Discard thought..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Figured as much." [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not much. I don't have a *fresh pe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not much. I don't have a *fresh perspective* on it. Should we go?"

fields.Title: morekimquestions
Kim Kitsuragi: ""You okay there?" The lieutenant's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You okay there?" The lieutenant's sudden voice cuts like a blade, bringing you out of the stupor.

fields.Title: You: ""Man, how many people got shot duri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Man, how many people got shot during that Revolution?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Plenty.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Plenty."

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, look... more bullet holes. So..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, look... more bullet holes. Someone has been shot here."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Another set of awfully old bullet h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Another set of awfully old bullet holes.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps *a* crime of a sort, ages..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps *a* crime of a sort, ages ago... but no, these do not warrant an investigation."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.sense_bulletholes_viscal_said_old"]
Variable["plaza.sense_bulletholes_viscal_said_old"]
!(Variable["plaza.sense_bulletholes_viscal_said_old"])
Pain Threshold: "The spread pattern of these bullet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The spread pattern of these bullet holes makes your chest ache. Your breath grows heavier.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant inspects the wall, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant inspects the wall, then nods. "Another set of old bullet holes from the Revolution."

fields.Title: You: ""What's with all these bullet holes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's with all these bullet holes? I've seen a lot of them around."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at the wall. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at the wall. "Remnants from the Revolution. These are over half a century old."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "This is bad mojo, man! Fuckin' horr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is bad mojo, man! Fuckin' horrible mojo. The end draws near!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A history of violence streaking al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A history of violence streaking all across Revachol."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "You peer into the faded marks in th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You peer into the faded marks in the stone... they peer back like an endless row of tiny black holes. Sweat starts trickling down your brow.
